N50.title: N50 (Kbp)
N50.description: N50 is the contig length such that using longer or equal length contigs produces half (50%) of the bases of the assembly (kilo base pairs)

Total length.title: Assembly Length (Mbp)
Total length.description: The total number of bases in the assembly (Mbp).

N50.title: N50 (Kbp)
N50.description: N50 is the contig length such that using longer or equal length contigs produces half (50%) of the bases of the assembly.

L50.title: L50 (K)
L50.description: L50 is the number of contigs larger than N50, i.e. the minimum number of contigs comprising 50% of the total assembly length.

Largest_contig.title: Largest contig (Kbp)
Largest_contig.description: The size of the largest contig of the assembly

Total_length.title: Length (Mbp)
Total_length.description: The total number of bases in the assembly.
